name: Down - The Way Out
description:
"Down - The Way Out" is a university project that involves a first-person puzzle game which delves into changing gravity in order to move across levels, made for the "Gotland Game conference 2019" from the the team SpamBox.

 Comment or contact us through our mail for any feedback and criticism:

spawmboxstudio@gmail.com

http://downgame.one/
